last_episode_to_air.name: You Don't Understand Me at All
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Jesse case comes to a close, it becomes quickly clear that the horrible ordeal is far from over. Annie and our town are brought to a perilous and emotion climax.

name: Bellevue
overview: When a transgender teen goes missing, Annie Ryder—a cop at odds with her hometown—dives in to unravel the disappearance that suggests foul play, despite finding herself in a difficult position as she must cast suspicion on people she has known all her life.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Detective Annie Ryder and her small town are rocked by the disappearance of a local teenager.

episodes.name: He's Back
episodes.overview: As Annie and the detectives continue the search for Jesse Sweetland, Annie's relationship with the Riddler is tested and grows. They get a shocking break in the case.

episodes.name: The Guy with Fire in His Eyes
episodes.overview: As Annie and Peter agree that Annie should keep her relationship going, a new riddle leads her to question a beloved community member about Jesse's disappearance.

episodes.name: Hello Little Light
episodes.overview: With the cops operating off a strong lead, the case of Jesse's disappearance appears to come close to conclusion - though Annie doesn't buy it.

episodes.name: How Do I Remember?
episodes.overview: As the town and cops are moving on from the Jesse case, Annie pursues a new angle that takes her down a road she dreads. She and the Riddler reach a new level.

episodes.name: The Problem with the Truth
episodes.overview: Annie starts looking into the Sandy Driver case with her dad's notebook - looking for connections to the Jesse case and makes a heartbreaking discovery.

episodes.name: The Man Behind the Curtain
episodes.overview: As Annie and the detectives dig back into a previous suspect, the Jesse case breaks wide open and Annie finds herself fighting for her life.

episodes.name: You Don't Understand Me at All
episodes.overview: As the Jesse case comes to a close, it becomes quickly clear that the horrible ordeal is far from over. Annie and our town are brought to a perilous and emotion climax.
